name: Ice Market
description:
Buy knitted goods and sell them to customers at an icy winter market. But don't slip and buy the wrong things!

Instructions:

  • Click (or drag) the bone to move it. The puppy will chase it
  • Buy products from vendors for $5
  • Sell them to customers for $10
  • You can only hold one item at a time. If you're already holding one when you pick one up, it will be lost
  • You have until the end of the song to make as much money as possible

Made by three people in three hours for Trijam #163
Programming was done by C. Haine in Scratch v3.
Artwork was drawn by K. Haine using Krita.
Music was composed by P. Haine using Logic Pro. Sound effects were edited in Audacity.
